channel.title: Best source that you have played on, owned, or heard about?
channel.description: People are saying that I sould get a new source but i cant find a really good one. Does anyone know one that has specials in it? I didnt really look so now im going to look in the download section. And would it be possible if i transfered all my chars into that new one and would it work?

item.title: Best source that you have played on, owned, or heard about?
item.dc:creator: @clienthax clienthax
item.description:
@clienthax wrote:

testscape
you can transfer chars if the format is the same

Read full topic
